blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > Paper2D

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UObject
  • IInterface_CollisionDataProvider
  • ISlateTextureAtlasInterface
  • PAPER2UPaperSprite

References

   
Module Paper2D
Header /Engine/Plugins/2D/Paper2D/Source/Paper2D/Classes/PaperSprite.h
Include #include "PaperSprite.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (BlueprintType, Meta=(DisplayThumbnail="true"))  
class PAPER2UPaperSprite :  
    public UObject,  
    public IInterface_CollisionDataProvider,  
    public ISlateTextureAtlasInterface

Remarks

Sprite Asset

Stores the data necessary to render a single 2D sprite (from a region of a texture) Can also contain collision shapes for the sprite.

Variables

  Type Name Description
TArray< TObjectPtr< UTexture > > AdditionalSourceTextures Additional source textures for other slots.
TObjectPtr< UMaterialInterface > AlternateMaterial The alternate material to use on a sprite instance if not overridden (this is only used for Diced render geometry, and will be the opaque material in that case, slot 1)
int32 AlternateMaterialSplitIndex The point at which the alternate material takes over in the baked render data (or INDEX_NONE)
TObjectPtr< class UPaperSpriteAtlas > AtlasGroup Spritesheet group that this sprite belongs to.
TArray< FVector4 > BakedRenderData Baked render data (triangle vertices, stored as XY UV tuples) XY is the XZ position in world space, relative to the pivot UV is normalized (0..1) There should always be a multiple of three elements in this array
FVector2D BakedSourceDimension Dimensions within BakedSourceTexture (in pixels)
TObjectPtr< UTexture2D > BakedSourceTexture  
FVector2D BakedSourceUV Position within BakedSourceTexture (in pixels)
TObjectPtr< class UBodySetup > BodySetup Baked physics data.
bool bRotatedInSourceImage This texture is rotated in the atlas.
bool bSnapPivotToPixelGrid Should the pivot be snapped to a pixel boundary?
bool bTrimmedInSourceImage This texture is trimmed, consider the values above.
FSpriteGeometryCollection CollisionGeometry Custom collision geometry polygons (in texture space)
float CollisionThickness The extrusion thickness of collision geometry when using a 3D collision domain.
FVector2D CustomPivotPoint Custom pivot point (relative to the sprite rectangle)
TObjectPtr< UMaterialInterface > DefaultMaterial The material to use on a sprite instance if not overridden (this is the default material when only one is being used, and is the translucent/masked material for Diced render geometry, slot 0)
FVector2D OriginInSourceImageBeforeTrimming Origin within SourceImage, prior to atlasing.
TEnumAsByte< ESpritePivotMode::Type > PivotMode Pivot mode.
float PixelsPerUnrealUnit The scaling factor between pixels and Unreal units (cm) (e.g., 0.64 would make a 64 pixel wide sprite take up 100 cm)
TSoftObjectPtr< class UPaperSpriteAtlas > PreviousAtlasGroup The previous spritesheet group this belonged to To make sure we remove ourselves from it if changed or nulled out
FSpriteGeometryCollection RenderGeometry Custom render geometry polygons (in texture space)
TArray< FPaperSpriteSocket > Sockets List of sockets on this sprite.
FVector2D SourceDimension Dimensions within SourceTexture (in pixels)
FVector2D SourceImageDimensionBeforeTrimming Dimensions of SourceImage.
TSoftObjectPtr< UTexture2D > SourceTexture The source texture that the sprite comes from.
TObjectPtr< UTexture2D > SourceTextureCacheNeverSerialized  
FVector2D SourceTextureDimension Dimension of the texture when this sprite was created Used when the sprite is resized at some point
FVector2D SourceUV Position within SourceTexture (in pixels)
TEnumAsByte< ESpriteCollisionMode::Type > SpriteCollisionDomain Collision domain (no collision, 2D, or 3D)
